head.title: World Briefing | Asia: Nepal: U.N. Creates New Political Mission

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Asia: Nepal: U.N. Creates New Political Mission

abstract.p: United Nations Security Council votes to set up mission in Nepal to oversee disarmament and cease-fire accord between government and former Maoist rebels and plan elections of constitutional assembly (S)

block.p: The United Nations Security Council voted to set up a mission to oversee a disarmament and cease-fire accord between the government and former Maoist rebels and plan elections of a constitutional assembly in June. The vote creates a force of military monitors, police and civil administration teams and poll watchers, which was requested by each sides and will last a year.

The United Nations Security Council voted to set up a mission to oversee a disarmament and cease-fire accord between the government and former Maoist rebels and plan elections of a constitutional assembly in June. The vote creates a force of military monitors, police and civil administration teams and poll watchers, which was requested by each sides and will last a year.
